channel.title: [457] client need help
channel.description:
Since Runescape had an update a few hours ago, i can't log in to my 457 client because the searching for updates never loaded. I went to client.java and fixed that by replacing all 457's to 458's. But still, when i log in it says "Server has been updated! Please reload this page." Does anybody know how to fix this?
Thanks.
